_header: Saint Augustine was named that name
Subjects: Augustine of Hippo, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Augustine, in the Vernon Golden Legend — in short couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Austin was nempned þat nameffor þreo causus of gret
                    fame…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…God ȝiue ou grace wiþ herte gladeTo preye for him
                    þat þis lyf made. AMEN
